game.title: The Lost Amulet
game.description: In this quest, you must journey into the hidden temple and recover the lost amulet, said to grant incredible powers to its possessor. Be wary, for the temple is full of traps and dangerous creatures.
game.reward: 1000 gold coins and a rare artifact

task.objective: Find the entrance to the temple
task.description: Your first task is to discover the hidden entrance to the temple. The entrance is rumored to be near a waterfall in the enchanted forest.
